casebody.data:
HENRY STEERS, Inc., Appellee, v. DAUNTLESS TOWING LINE, Inc., Appellee, and Morris & Cummings Dredging Co., Appellant. No. 74. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 1, 1930. Charles W. Hagen and John M. Aherne, both of New York City, for appellant. William F. Purdy and John E. Purdy, both of New York City, for appellee Henry Steers, Inc. Foley & Martin, of New York City (James A. Martin, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee Dauntless Towing Line, Inc.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
